The Higher Key

December 5, 2011

There are things that only you can do, and you are alive to do them. In the great orchestra we call life, you have an instrument and a song, and you owe it to God to play them both sublimely. But there is a canyon of difference between doing your best to glorify God and doing whatever it takes to glorify yourself. The quest of excellence is a mark of maturity. The quest for power is childish.

-Max Lucado
